mapper.select: select h.type as imType, h.sender as senderId, u.real_name as senderName, u.photo as senderPhoto, h.create_date as senderDate, h.msg as msg from ms_chat_history h LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = h.sender AND u.delete_flag = 'Used' where h.delete_flag = 'Used' AND h.type = 'Group' AND h.receiver = #{receiverId} ORDER BY h.create_date LIMIT ${limitStart}, ${size}
select count(1) from ms_chat_history h where h.delete_flag = 'Used' AND h.type = 'Group' AND h.receiver = #{receiverId}

select h.type as imType, h.sender as senderId, u.real_name as senderName, u.photo as senderPhoto, h.create_date as senderDate, h.msg as msg from ms_chat_history h LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = h.sender AND u.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE h.delete_flag = 'Used' AND h.type = 'Single' AND ( ( h.sender = #{senderId} and h.receiver = #{receiverId} ) OR ( h.sender = #{receiverId} and h.receiver = #{senderId} ) ) ORDER BY h.create_date LIMIT ${limitStart}, ${size}

select count(1) from ms_chat_history h LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = h.sender AND u.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE h.delete_flag = 'Used' AND h.type = 'Single' AND ( ( h.sender = #{senderId} and h.receiver = #{receiverId} ) OR ( h.sender = #{receiverId} and h.receiver = #{senderId} ) )
